summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3783 for the improvement of North 68th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to West Green Lake Way, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46612, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
